title: Adv Research Methods II
description: Building on Advanced Research Methods I, the course will cover advanced policy analysis and modeling methods, for example, panel data and nonparametric regression. Other policy research methods may be explored as time permits.

prerequisites: PUBP 8200 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
